title: Q: can "datalad siblings add" just add a remote as  autoenabled type=git special remote?
body:
I kept doing that dance manually, the one we already do I believe in `create-sibling`, smth like 

```shell
git remote add --fetch datasets.datalad.org_ http://datasets.datalad.org/labs/mvdm/Kilosort2_results/.git/
git annex initremote datasets.datalad.org type=git location=http://datasets.datalad.org/labs/mvdm/Kilosort2_results/.git/ autoenable=true 
git remote remove datasets.datalad.org_
```

I think it should be `datalad siblings --as-common-datasrc` but it seems to not yet working out that use case correctly:

```shell
tmp > datalad install https://github.com/datalad-datasets/hcp_wm_preprocessed                              
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                                            
install(ok): /tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed (dataset)                                                                  
datalad install https://github.com/datalad-datasets/hcp_wm_preprocessed  3.76s user 2.25s system 80% cpu 7.450 total

/tmp > cd hcp_wm_preprocessed 

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > git remote
datalad
origin

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > datalad siblings
.: here(+) [git]
.: origin(-) [https://github.com/datalad-datasets/hcp_wm_preprocessed (git)]
.: datalad(+) [datalad]

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > git show git-annex:remote.log
6239b9e6-0b94-48f9-b9c1-15c5581d2524 autoenable=true encryption=none externaltype=datalad name=datalad type=external timestamp=1593790927.331819559s

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > datalad siblings --url https://datasets.datalad.org/.git --as-common-datasrc datasets.datalad.org add  
CommandError: 'git-annex initremote -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3 datasets.datalad.org type=git location=https://datasets.datalad.org/.git autoenable=true' failed with exitcode 1 under /tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed
git-annex: There is already a remote named "datasets.datalad.org"

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > datalad siblings             
.: here(+) [git]
.: datalad(+) [datalad]
.: origin(-) [https://github.com/datalad-datasets/hcp_wm_preprocessed (git)]
.: datasets.datalad.org(+) [https://datasets.datalad.org/.git (git)]

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > git show git-annex:remote.log
6239b9e6-0b94-48f9-b9c1-15c5581d2524 autoenable=true encryption=none externaltype=datalad name=datalad type=external timestamp=1593790927.331819559s

/tmp/hcp_wm_preprocessed > datalad --version
datalad 0.13.0.dev44

```
